00046 // define special string conversions
00047 template<typename T> std::string toStringConv( const T &src )
00048 {
00049     std::stringstream s;
00050     s << std::boolalpha << src; // bool will be converted to true/false
00051     return s.str();
00052 }
00053 template<> std::string toStringConv<uint8_t>( const uint8_t &src ) {return toStringConv( static_cast<uint16_t>( src ) );}
00054 template<> std::string toStringConv<int8_t> ( const  int8_t &src ) {return toStringConv( static_cast< int16_t>( src ) );}
00055 
00056 //Define generator - this can be global because its using convert internally
00057 template<typename SRC, typename DST> class ValueGenerator: public ValueConverterBase
00058 {
00059 public:
00060     void create( boost::scoped_ptr<ValueBase>& dst )const {
00061         LOG_IF( dst.get(), Debug, error ) << "Generating into existing value " << dst->toString( true ) << " (dropping this).";
00062         Value<DST> *ref = new Value<DST>;
00063         dst.reset( ref );
00064     }
00065     boost::numeric::range_check_result generate( const ValueBase &src, boost::scoped_ptr<ValueBase>& dst )const {
00066         create( dst );
00067         assert( dst );
00068         const boost::numeric::range_check_result result = convert( src.castToType<SRC>(), *dst );
00069         return result;
00070     }
00071 };
00072

00077 {
00078 public:
00079     //uncomment this to see which conversions are not generated - be carefull, thats f***king much

00082                 "There will be no " << (SAME?"copy":NUMERIC?"numeric":"non-numeric") <<  " conversion for " <<
00083                 util::Value<SRC>::staticName() << " to " << util::Value<DST>::staticName() << std::endl;
00084             return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>();
00085         }*/
00086     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00087 };
00089 // trivial version -- for conversion of the same type
00091 template<bool NUMERIC, typename SRC, typename DST> class ValueConverter<NUMERIC, true, SRC, DST> : public ValueGenerator<SRC, DST>
00092 {
00093     ValueConverter() {
00094         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00095                 << "Creating trivial copy converter for " << Value<SRC>::staticName();
00096     };
00097 public:
00098     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00099         ValueConverter<NUMERIC, true, SRC, DST> *ret = new ValueConverter<NUMERIC, true, SRC, DST>;
00100         return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>( ret );
00101     }
00102     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const ValueBase &src, ValueBase &dst )const {
00103         SRC &dstVal = dst.castTo<SRC>();
00104         const SRC &srcVal = src.castTo<SRC>();
00105         dstVal = srcVal;
00106         return boost::numeric::cInRange;
00107     }
00108     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00109 };

00112 // Numeric version -- uses boost::numeric_cast
00114 struct NumericOverflowHandler { //@todo this is NOT thread-safe
00115     static boost::numeric::range_check_result result;
00116     void operator() ( boost::numeric::range_check_result r ) { // throw bad_numeric_conversion derived
00117         result = r;
00118     }
00119 };
00120 boost::numeric::range_check_result NumericOverflowHandler::result = boost::numeric::cInRange;
00121 
00122 template<typename SRC, typename DST> class ValueConverter<true, false, SRC, DST> : public ValueGenerator<SRC, DST>
00123 {
00124     ValueConverter() {
00125         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00126                 << "Creating numeric converter from "
00127                 << Value<SRC>::staticName() << " to " << Value<DST>::staticName();
00128     };
00129 public:
00130     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00131         ValueConverter<true, false, SRC, DST> *ret = new ValueConverter<true, false, SRC, DST>;
00132         return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>( ret );
00133     }
00134     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const ValueBase &src, ValueBase &dst )const {
00135         typedef boost::numeric::converter <
00136         DST, SRC,
00137            boost::numeric::conversion_traits<DST, SRC>,
00138            NumericOverflowHandler,
00139            boost::numeric::RoundEven<SRC>
00140            > converter;
00141         DST &dstVal = dst.castTo<DST>();
00142         const SRC &srcVal = src.castTo<SRC>();
00143         NumericOverflowHandler::result = boost::numeric::cInRange;
00144         dstVal = converter::convert( srcVal );
00145         return NumericOverflowHandler::result;
00146     }
00147     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00148 };

00151 // Conversion for complex numbers
00153 template<typename SRC, typename DST> class ValueConverter<false, false, std::complex<SRC>, std::complex<DST> > : public ValueGenerator<std::complex<SRC>, std::complex<DST> >
00154 {
00155     ValueConverter() {
00156         LOG( Debug, verbose_info ) << "Creating complex-complex converter from " << Value<std::complex<SRC> >::staticName() << " to " << Value<std::complex<DST> >::staticName();
00157     };
00158 public:
00159     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00160         ValueConverter<false, false, std::complex<SRC>, std::complex<DST> > *ret = new ValueConverter<false, false, std::complex<SRC>, std::complex<DST> >;
00161         return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>( ret );
00162     }
00163     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const ValueBase &src, ValueBase &dst )const {
00164         typedef boost::numeric::converter <
00165         std::complex<DST> , std::complex<SRC> ,
00166             boost::numeric::conversion_traits<std::complex<DST>, std::complex<SRC> >,
00167             NumericOverflowHandler,
00168             boost::numeric::RoundEven<std::complex<SRC> >
00169             > converter;
00170         NumericOverflowHandler::result = boost::numeric::cInRange;
00171         const std::complex<SRC> &srcVal = src.castTo<std::complex<SRC> >();
00172         std::complex<DST> &dstVal = dst.castTo<std::complex<DST> >();
00173 
00174         dstVal = converter::convert( srcVal );
00175         return NumericOverflowHandler::result;
00176     }
00177     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00178 };

00181 // Conversion for "normal" to complex numbers -- uses ValueConverter on the real part
00183 template<typename SRC, typename DST> class ValueConverter<false, false, SRC, std::complex<DST> > : public ValueGenerator<SRC, std::complex<DST> >
00184 {
00185     boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> m_conv;
00186     ValueConverter( boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> elem_conv ): m_conv( elem_conv ) {
00187         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00188                 << "Creating number-complex converter from "
00189                 << Value<SRC>::staticName() << " to " << Value<std::complex<DST> >::staticName();
00190     };
00191 public:
00192     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00193         typedef boost::mpl::and_<boost::is_arithmetic<SRC>, boost::is_arithmetic<DST> > is_num;
00194         typedef boost::is_same<SRC, DST> is_same;
00195         boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> elem_conv =
00196             ValueConverter<is_num::value, is_same::value, SRC, DST>::get();
00197 
00198         if ( elem_conv ) { // if there is a conversion from SRC to DST create a conversion SRC => complex<DST> using that
00199             ValueConverter<false, false, SRC, std::complex<DST> > *ret = new ValueConverter<false, false, SRC, std::complex<DST> >( elem_conv );
00200             return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>( ret );
00201         } else {
00202             return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>();
00203         }
00204     }
00205     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const ValueBase &src, ValueBase &dst )const {
00206         std::complex<DST> &dstVal = dst.castTo<std::complex<DST> >();
00207         Value<DST> real;
00208         boost::numeric::range_check_result ret = m_conv->convert( src, real );
00209 
00210         if( ret == boost::numeric::cInRange )
00211             dstVal = std::complex<DST>( ( DST )real, DST() );
00212 
00213         return NumericOverflowHandler::result;
00214     }
00215     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00216 };

00220 // vector4 version -- uses ValueConverter on every element
00222 template<typename SRC, typename DST > class ValueConverter<false, false, vector4<SRC>, vector4<DST> >: public ValueGenerator<vector4<SRC>, vector4<DST> >
00223 {
00224     boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> m_conv;
00225     ValueConverter( boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> elem_conv ): m_conv( elem_conv ) {
00226         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00227                 << "Creating vector converter from "
00228                 << Value<vector4<SRC> >::staticName() << " to " << Value<vector4<DST> >::staticName();
00229     };
00230 public:
00231     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00232         typedef boost::mpl::and_<boost::is_arithmetic<SRC>, boost::is_arithmetic<DST> > is_num;
00233         typedef boost::is_same<SRC, DST> is_same;
00234         boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> elem_conv =
00235             ValueConverter<is_num::value, is_same::value, SRC, DST>::get();
00236 
00237         if ( elem_conv ) {
00238             ValueConverter<false, false, vector4<SRC>, vector4<DST> > *ret = new ValueConverter<false, false, vector4<SRC>, vector4<DST> >( elem_conv );
00239             return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>( ret );
00240         } else {
00241             return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>();
00242         }
00243     }
00244     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const ValueBase &src, ValueBase &dst )const {
00245         vector4<DST> &dstVal = dst.castTo<vector4<DST> >();
00246         const vector4<SRC> &srcVal = src.castTo<vector4<SRC> >();
00247         boost::numeric::range_check_result ret = boost::numeric::cInRange;
00248 
00249         for ( int i = 0; i < 4; i++ ) {//slow and ugly, but flexible
00250             Value<DST> elem_dst;
00251             const boost::numeric::range_check_result result = m_conv->convert( Value<SRC>( srcVal[i] ), elem_dst );
00252 
00253             if ( result != boost::numeric::cInRange )
00254                 ret = result;
00255 
00256             dstVal[i] = ( DST )elem_dst;
00257         }
00258 
00259         return ret;
00260     }
00261     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00262 };
00263 
00265 // list version -- uses ValueConverter on every element
00267 template<typename SRC, typename DST > class ValueConverter<false, false, std::list<SRC>, std::list<DST> >: public ValueGenerator<std::list<SRC>, std::list<DST> >
00268 {
00269     boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> m_conv;
00270     ValueConverter( boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> elem_conv ): m_conv( elem_conv ) {
00271         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00272                 << "Creating list converter from "
00273                 << Value<std::list<SRC> >::staticName() << " to " << Value<std::list<DST> >::staticName();
00274     };
00275 public:
00276     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00277         typedef boost::mpl::and_<boost::is_arithmetic<SRC>, boost::is_arithmetic<DST> > is_num;
00278         typedef boost::is_same<SRC, DST> is_same;
00279         boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> elem_conv =
00280             ValueConverter<is_num::value, is_same::value, SRC, DST>::get();
00281 
00282         if ( elem_conv ) {
00283             ValueConverter<false, false, std::list<SRC>, std::list<DST> > *ret = new ValueConverter<false, false, std::list<SRC>, std::list<DST> >( elem_conv );
00284             return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>( ret );
00285         } else {
00286             return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>();
00287         }
00288     }
00289     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const ValueBase &src, ValueBase &dst )const {
00290         std::list<DST> &dstVal = dst.castTo<std::list<DST> >();
00291         LOG_IF( ! dstVal.empty(), CoreLog, warning )
00292                 << "Storing into non empty list while conversion from "
00293                 << Value<std::list<SRC> >::staticName() << " to " << Value<std::list<DST> >::staticName();
00294         const std::list<SRC> &srcVal = src.castTo<std::list<SRC> >();
00295         boost::numeric::range_check_result ret = boost::numeric::cInRange;
00296 
00297         for ( typename std::list<SRC>::const_iterator i = srcVal.begin(); i != srcVal.end(); i++ ) {//slow and ugly, but flexible
00298             Value<DST> elem_dst;
00299             const boost::numeric::range_check_result result = m_conv->convert( Value<SRC>( *i ), elem_dst );
00300 
00301             if ( result != boost::numeric::cInRange )
00302                 ret = result;
00303 
00304             dstVal.push_back( ( DST )elem_dst );
00305         }
00306 
00307         return ret;
00308     }
00309     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00310 };

00314 // string version -- uses special string converter to convert from/to string
00316 template<typename DST> class ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, DST> : public ValueGenerator<std::string, DST>
00317 {
00318     boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> inner_conv;
00319     ValueConverter() {
00320         typedef boost::is_arithmetic<DST> is_num;
00321 
00322         if( is_num::value ) // if DST is a number we can go via double to do a proper conversion
00323             inner_conv =
00324                 ValueConverter<is_num::value, boost::is_same<double, DST>::value, double, DST>::get();
00325 
00326         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00327                 << "Creating from-string converter for " << Value<DST>::staticName();
00328     };
00329 public:
00330     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00331         ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, DST> *ret = new ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, DST>;
00332         return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>( ret );
00333     }
00334     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const ValueBase &src, ValueBase &dst )const {
00335         const std::string &srcVal = src.castTo<std::string>();
00336 
00337         try {
00338             if( inner_conv ) { // if the target is a number first map to double and then convert that into DST
00339                 return inner_conv->convert( Value<double>( srcVal ), dst );
00340             } else { // otherwise try direct mapping (rounding will fail)
00341                 LOG( Debug, warning ) << "using lexical_cast to convert from string to "
00342                                       << Value<DST>::staticName() << " no rounding can be done.";
00343                 DST &dstVal = dst.castTo<DST>();
00344                 dstVal = boost::lexical_cast<DST>( srcVal );
00345             }
00346         } catch( const boost::bad_lexical_cast & ) {
00347             dst.castTo<DST>() = DST();
00348             LOG( Runtime, error ) << "Miserably failed to interpret " << MSubject( srcVal ) << " as " << Value<DST>::staticName() << " returning " << MSubject( DST() );
00349         }
00350 
00351         return boost::numeric::cInRange;
00352     }
00353     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00354 };
00355 template<typename DST> class ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, std::complex<DST> > : public ValueGenerator<std::string, std::complex<DST> >
00356 {
00357     ValueConverter() {
00358         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00359                 << "Creating from-string converter for " << Value<std::complex<DST> >::staticName();
00360     };
00361 public:
00362     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00363         ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, std::complex<DST> > *ret = new ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, std::complex<DST> >;
00364         return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>( ret );
00365     }
00366     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const ValueBase &src, ValueBase &dst )const {
00367         std::complex<DST> &dstVal = dst.castTo<std::complex<DST> >();
00368         const std::string &srcVal = src.castTo<std::string>();
00369         dstVal = boost::lexical_cast<std::complex<DST> >( srcVal );
00370         return boost::numeric::cInRange; //@todo handle bad casts
00371     }
00372     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00373 };
00374 template<typename SRC> class ValueConverter<false, false, SRC, std::string> : public ValueGenerator<SRC, std::string>
00375 {
00376     ValueConverter() {
00377         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00378                 << "Creating to-string converter for " << Value<SRC>::staticName();
00379     };
00380 public:
00381     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00382         ValueConverter<false, false, SRC, std::string> *ret = new ValueConverter<false, false, SRC, std::string>;
00383         return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>( ret );
00384     }
00385     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const ValueBase &src, ValueBase &dst )const {
00386         dst.castTo<std::string>() = toStringConv( src.castTo<SRC>() );
00387         return boost::numeric::cInRange; // this should allways be ok
00388     }
00389     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00390 };

00393 // special version to convert from string to a given selection
00394 // (lexical_cast doesnt work here, because it creates a temporary buffer)
00396 template<> class ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, Selection> : public ValueGenerator<std::string, Selection>
00397 {
00398     ValueConverter() {
00399         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00400                 << "Creating special from-string converter for " << Value<Selection>::staticName();
00401     };
00402 public:
00403     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00404         ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, Selection> *ret = new ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, Selection>;
00405         return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>( ret );
00406     }
00407     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const ValueBase &src, ValueBase &dst )const {
00408         Selection &dstVal = dst.castTo<Selection>();
00409         const std::string &srcVal = src.castTo<std::string>();
00410 
00411         if ( dstVal.set( srcVal.c_str() ) )
00412             return boost::numeric::cInRange;
00413         else
00414             return boost::numeric::cPosOverflow; //if the string is not "part" of the selection we count this as positive overflow
00415     }
00416     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00417 };

00421 // string/bool version -- uses decision based on text
00423 template<> class ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, bool> : public ValueGenerator<std::string, bool>
00424 {
00425     ValueConverter() {
00426         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00427                 << "Creating special from-string converter for " << Value<bool>::staticName();
00428     };
00429 public:
00430     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00431         ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, bool> *ret = new ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, bool>;
00432         return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>( ret );
00433     }
00434     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const ValueBase &src, ValueBase &dst )const {
00435         bool &dstVal = dst.castTo<bool>();
00436         const std::string srcVal = boost::algorithm::to_lower_copy<std::string>( src.castTo<std::string>() );
00437 
00438         if (  srcVal == "true" || srcVal == "y" || srcVal == "yes" ) {
00439             dstVal = true;
00440         } else if ( srcVal == "false" || srcVal == "n" || srcVal == "no" ) {
00441             dstVal = false;
00442         } else {
00443             LOG( Runtime, warning ) << src.toString( true ) << " is ambiguous while converting to " << Value<bool>::staticName();
00444             return boost::numeric::cPosOverflow;
00445         }
00446 
00447         return boost::numeric::cInRange;
00448     }
00449     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00450 };

00453 // string => list/vector version -- uses util::stringToList
00455 template<typename DST> class ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, std::list<DST> >: public ValueGenerator<std::string, std::list<DST> >  //string => list
00456 {
00457     ValueConverter() {
00458         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00459                 << "Creating from-string converter for " << Value<std::list<DST> >::staticName();
00460     };
00461 public:
00462     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00463         ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, std::list<DST> > *ret = new ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, std::list<DST> >;
00464         return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>( ret );
00465     }
00466     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const ValueBase &src, ValueBase &dst )const {
00467         std::list<DST> &dstVal = dst.castTo<std::list<DST> >();
00468         LOG_IF( ! dstVal.empty(), CoreLog, warning )
00469                 << "Conversion from " << Value<std::string>::staticName()
00470                 << " into non empty list  " << Value<std::list<DST> >::staticName()
00471                 << " previous content will be lost";
00472         const std::string &srcVal = src.castTo<std::string>();
00473         const std::list<DST> buff = util::stringToList<DST>( srcVal, boost::regex( "[\\s,;]+" ) );
00474         dstVal.assign( buff.begin(), buff.end() );
00475         return boost::numeric::cInRange;  //@todo handle bad casts
00476     }
00477     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00478 };
00479 template<typename DST> class ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, vector4<DST> >: public ValueGenerator<std::string, vector4<DST> >  //string => vector4
00480 {
00481     ValueConverter() {
00482         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00483                 << "Creating from-string converter for " << Value<vector4<DST> >::staticName();
00484     };
00485 public:
00486     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> get() {
00487         ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, vector4<DST> > *ret = new ValueConverter<false, false, std::string, vector4<DST> >;
00488         return boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase>( ret );
00489     }
00490     boost::numeric::range_check_result convert( const ValueBase &src, ValueBase &dst )const {
00491         vector4<DST> &dstVal = dst.castTo<vector4<DST> >();
00492         const std::string &srcVal = src.castTo<std::string>();
00493         const std::list<DST> buff = stringToList<DST>( srcVal, boost::regex( "[\\s,;]+" ) );
00494         dstVal.copyFrom( buff.begin(), buff.end() );
00495         return boost::numeric::cInRange; //@todo handle bad casts
00496     }
00497     virtual ~ValueConverter() {}
00498 };

00516 
00518 template<typename SRC> struct inner_TypeConverter {
00519     std::map<int, boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> > &m_subMap;
00520     inner_TypeConverter( std::map<int, boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> > &subMap ): m_subMap( subMap ) {}
00521     template<typename DST> void operator()( DST ) { //will be called by the mpl::for_each in outer_TypeConverter for any DST out of "types"
00522         //create a converter based on the type traits and the types of SRC and DST
00523         typedef boost::mpl::and_<boost::is_arithmetic<SRC>, boost::is_arithmetic<DST> > is_num;
00524         typedef boost::is_same<SRC, DST> is_same;
00525         boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> conv =
00526             ValueConverter<is_num::value, is_same::value, SRC, DST>::get();
00527         //and insert it into the to-conversion-map of SRC
00528         m_subMap.insert( m_subMap.end(), std::make_pair( Value<DST>::staticID, conv ) );
00529     }
00530 };
00531 
00533 struct outer_TypeConverter {
00534     std::map< int , std::map<int, boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> > > &m_map;
00535     outer_TypeConverter( std::map< int , std::map<int, boost::shared_ptr<const ValueConverterBase> > > &map ): m_map( map ) {}
00536     template<typename SRC> void operator()( SRC ) {//will be called by the mpl::for_each in ValueConverterMap() for any SRC out of "types"
00537         boost::mpl::for_each<types>( // create a functor for from-SRC-conversion and call its ()-operator for any DST out of "types"
00538             inner_TypeConverter<SRC>( m_map[Value<SRC>().getTypeID()] )
00539         );
00540     }
00541 };
00543 
00544 ValueConverterMap::ValueConverterMap()
00545 {
00546     boost::mpl::for_each<types>( outer_TypeConverter( *this ) );
00547     LOG( Debug, info ) << "conversion map for " << size() << " types created";
00548 }
00549 
00550 }
00551 }
00552 }
